text: I would want my legacy to be that I was a great son, father and friend.
author: Dante Hall

text: To be as good as our fathers we must be better, imitation is not discipleship.
author: Wendell Phillips

text: It doesn't matter who my father was it matters who I remember he was.
author: Anne Sexton

text: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
author: William Shakespeare

text: A man knows when he is growing old because he begins to look like his father.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

text: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
author: George Herbert

text: When a father gives to his son, both laugh when a son gives to his father, both cry.
author: William Shakespeare

text: I'm a father that's what matters most. Nothing matters more.
author: Gordon Brown

text: I decided in my life that I would do nothing that did not reflect positively on my father's life.
author: Sidney Poitier

text: Being a father helps me be more responsible... you see more things than you've ever seen.
author: Kid Rock

text: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
author: Euripides
